documentation.title: Thuso le Litokomane
documentation.subtitle: Fumana litataiso le mehloli e tla u thusa ho fumana molemo o moholo ho Contentry. Khetha tataiso ho latela karolo ea hau.

whatsNew.title: Tse ncha ke life
whatsNew.description: E fumane lintlafatso ka bohona le likarolo tse ncha tse kentsoeng sethaleng
whatsNew.subtitle: E lemohile ka bohona liphetoho le lintlafatso sethaleng
whatsNew.feature1: Liphetoho tsa UI tse bonoang ka bohona

adminGuide.title: Tataiso ea Tsamaiso
adminGuide.description: Tataiso e felletseng bakeng sa batsamaisi ba sethala. Ithute ho laola basebelisi, ho beha leihlo tlhahlobo, le ho hlophisa litlhophiso tsa sistimi.

enterpriseGuide.title: Tataiso ea Khoebo
enterpriseGuide.description: Tataiso bakeng sa batsamaisi ba khamphani. Ithute ho laola sehlopha sa hau, ho theha metheo ea tsebo, le ho sebetsana le tumello ea litaba.
enterpriseGuide.feature3: Mekhoa ea Mosebetsi ea ho Amohela Litaba

userGuide.title: Tataiso ea Basebelisi
userGuide.description: Sohle seo o se hlokang ho theha, ho sekaseka le ho phatlalatsa dikahare. E loketse baqapi ba dikahare le barekisi.
userGuide.feature1: Lisebelisoa tsa ho hlahisa dikahare le AI
userGuide.feature2: Tlhahlobo ea Dikahare le ho Latela Melao
userGuide.feature4: Kopanyo ea Mecha ea Litaba ea Sechaba

overview.intro: Jwalo ka motsamaisi wa sethala, o na le phihlello ya disebediswa tse felletseng tsa ho beha leihlo le ho laola sethala sohle sa Contentry. Tataiso ena e tla o thusa ho utlwisisa bokgoni ba hao ba tsamaiso.
overview.dashboardDesc: Dashboard ea Tsamaiso e fana ka pono e ntle ea mesebetsi ea sethala le bophelo bo botle.
overview.feature1: Tlhokomelo ea mesebetsi ea basebelisi ka nako ea sebele
overview.feature2: Tlhahlobo ea litaba tsa sethala ka bophara
overview.feature3: Mekhahlelo ea bophelo bo botle ba sistimi le ts'ebetso
overview.feature4: Phihlello e potlakileng mesebetsing ea bohlokoa ea tsamaiso
overview.tip: Etela Dashboard ea Tsamaiso khafetsa ho lula u tseba ka mekhoa ea sethala le ho tseba mathata a ka bang teng esale pele.

userManagement.intro: Tsamaiso ea basebelisi ke mosebetsi oa bohlokoa oa tsamaiso o u lumellang ho okamela basebelisi le likhoebo tsohle sethaleng.
userManagement.viewUsersTitle: Ho Sheba le ho Laola Basebelisi
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Kena karolong ea Tsamaiso ea Basebelisi ho sheba, ho batla le ho laola basebelisi bohle ba sethala.
userManagement.feature1: Batla 'me u sefe basebelisi ka mabitso, imeile, kapa karolo
userManagement.feature2: Sheba liprofaele tse qaqileng tsa basebelisi le nalane ea mesebetsi
userManagement.feature3: Fetola mesebetsi le litumello tsa basebelisi
userManagement.feature4: Tlosa kapa hlakola liakhaonto tsa basebelisi ha ho hlokahala
userManagement.rolesDesc: Contentry e na le mesebetsi e meraro ea mantlha ea mosebelisi:
userManagement.role1: Tsamaiso: Phihlello e felletseng ea sethala ka bokhoni ba ho hlophisa sistimi
userManagement.role2: Tsamaiso ea Khoebo: E laola sehlopha le litlhophiso tsa khamphani ea bona
userManagement.role3: Mosebelisi: Likarolo tse tloaelehileng tsa tlhahiso le tlhahlobo ea litaba
userManagement.warning: Kamehla netefatsa tšusumetso pele o fetola mesebetsi ea basebelisi kapa o hlakola liakhaonto. Liketso tsena li ka ama ts'ebetso ea sehlopha.

analytics.intro: Litlhahlobo li fana ka temohisiso e tebileng mabapi le kamoo sethala se sebelisoang kateng ho likhoebo tsohle le basebelisi.
analytics.metric1: Basebelisi bohle ba mafolofolo le mekhoa ea kholo
analytics.metric2: Bolumo ba tlhahiso le tlhahlobo ea litaba
analytics.metric5: Ho latela melao le lintlha tsa kotsi ho pholletsa le likhoebo
analytics.tip: Romela litlaleho tsa tlhahlobo kantle ho naha bakeng sa linehelano tsa bankakarolo ho sebelisoa tšobotsi ea Khoasolla Tlaleho.

financials.intro: Karolo ea Kakaretso ea Lichelete e fana ka ponahalo ea lipalo-palo tsa lekeno la sethala le peeletso.
financials.revenueDesc: Ela hloko bophelo bo botle ba lichelete le mekhoa ea ho ngolisa likhoebong tsohle.
financials.feature1: Ho latela lekeno le iphetang la khoeli le khoeli (MRR)
financials.feature3: Tšebeliso ea mokitlane le nalane ea theko

systemConfig.intro: Tlhophiso ea sistimi e u lumella ho laola litlhophiso le lihokelo tsa sethala ka bophara.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Lokisa le ho beha leihlo likhokahano tsa mokha oa boraro:
systemConfig.integration1: API ea Ayrshare bakeng sa phatlalatso ea mecha ea litaba ea sechaba
systemConfig.integration2: Litšebeletso tsa AI bakeng sa tlhahiso le tlhahlobo ea litaba
systemConfig.tip: Kamehla leka ho kopanya tikolohong e behiloeng sethaleng pele o etsa liphetoho litlhophisong tsa tlhahiso.

gettingStarted.intro: Rea u amohela ho Contentry! Jwalo ka Motsamaisi wa Kgwebo, o na le disebediswa tsa ho laola sehlopha sa hao, ho theha ditataiso tsa dikahare, le ho netefatsa botsitso ba letshwao.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Latela mehato ena ho theha ak'haonte ea hau ea khoebo:
gettingStarted.step1: Tsamaea ho Litlhophiso > Khoebo ho fihlella dashboard ea k'hamphani ea hau
gettingStarted.step2: Kenya litataiso le maano a k'hamphani ea hau ho Knowledge Base
gettingStarted.step3: Mema litho tsa sehlopha sa hau 'me u abele mesebetsi e loketseng
gettingStarted.step4: Lokisa mekhoa ea tšebetso ea tumello bakeng sa tlhahlobo ea litaba
gettingStarted.tip: Qetella setaele sa hau sa Knowledge Base pele o mema ditho tsa sehlopha ho netefatsa hore ba na le phihlello ya tataiso ya letshwao ho tloha letsatsing la pele.

teamManagement.intro: Tsamaiso e sebetsang hantle ea sehlopha e netefatsa tšebelisano-'moho e boreleli le taolo e nepahetseng ea phihlello ka har'a mokhatlo oa hau.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Kenya litho tse ncha sehlopheng sa khoebo ea hau:
teamManagement.feature1: Kenya aterese ea lengolo-tsoibila ea setho sa sehlopha
teamManagement.feature2: Khetha karolo ea bona (Moqapi, Motsamaisi, kapa Motsamaisi)
teamManagement.feature3: Kenya molaetsa oa botho o ikhethileng memong
teamManagement.role1: Moqapi: A ka theha le ho romella dikahare bakeng sa tumello
teamManagement.role2: Motsamaisi: A ka amohela/a hana dikahare mme a laola baqapi
teamManagement.role3: Tsamaiso: Phihlello e felletseng ea khoebo ho kenyeletsoa le ho lefisa le litlhophiso
teamManagement.tip: Limemo li fela ka mor'a matsatsi a 7. Hopotsa litho tsa sehlopha ho amohela limemo tsa tsona kapele.

knowledgeBase.intro: Setsi sa Tsebo ke polokelo e ka sehloohong ea k'hamphani ea hau bakeng sa litataiso tsa lets'oao, maano le melao ea litaba. Litokomane tse kentsoeng mona li tsebisa litaba tse hlahisoang ke AI bakeng sa litho tsohle tsa sehlopha.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Kenya litokomane tse tla tataisa tlhahiso ea litaba:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Litataiso tsa setaele sa lets'oao le litataiso tsa lentsoe
knowledgeBase.docType2: Maano a molao le a ho latela melao
knowledgeBase.docType3: Litaelo tsa ho phatlalatsa melaetsa mecheng ea litaba tsa sechaba
knowledgeBase.tip: Kenya litataiso tsa hau tsa bohlokoa ka ho fetisisa tsa lets'oao pele. AI e beha litokomane tsa Knowledge Base tsa k'hamphani pele ho feta tse romelloang ke basebelisi ka bomong.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Mokhoa oa tšebetso oa tumello o netefatsa hore litaba tsohle li fihlela maemo a k'hamphani ea hau pele li phatlalatsoa.
approvalWorkflow.processDesc: Dikahare di phalla ka mekhahlelo ena:
approvalWorkflow.step1: Moqapi o hlahisa kapa o sekaseka dikahare
approvalWorkflow.step2: Dikahare di romelwa bakeng sa tumello (haeba ho hlokahala)
approvalWorkflow.step3: Motsamaisi o hlahloba le ho fana ka maikutlo
approvalWorkflow.step4: Dikahare tse amohetsweng di ka phatlalatswa di-platform tsa kahisano
approvalWorkflow.warning: Bulela litlhoko tsa tumello ho Litlhophiso ho netefatsa hore litaba tsohle lia hlahlojoa pele li phatlalatsoa.

billing.intro: Laola peeletso ea khoebo ea hau 'me u laole tšebeliso ea mokitlane.
billing.subscriptionDesc: Dashboard ea hau ea ho lefisa e fana ka:
billing.feature1: Lintlha tsa moralo oa hajoale le kabo ea mokitlane
billing.feature2: Nalane ea tšebeliso le mekitlane e setseng
billing.feature3: Nalane ea invoice le mekhoa ea ho lefa

adminUsersPage.subtitle: Laola basebelisi ba sethala ka bophara
adminUsersPage.confirmDelete: Na u na le bonnete ba hore u batla ho hlakola mosebelisi enoa?
adminUsersPage.deleteWarning: Ketso ena e ke ke ea fetoloa.

userDetails.title: Lintlha tsa mosebelisi
userDetails.currentPeriodEnd: Qetello ea Nako ea Hona Joale

deleteModal.title: Hlakola Mosebelisi
deleteModal.description: Sena se tla hlakola mosebelisi le data yohle e amanang le sona ka ho sa feleng:
deleteModal.irreversible: Ketso ena e ke ke ea fetoloa.

gettingStarted.intro: Rea u amohela ho Contentry! Tataiso ena e tla u thusa ho theha litaba tse khahlisang le tse lumellanang le melao u sebelisa lisebelisoa tse tsamaisoang ke AI.
gettingStarted.step1: Hlophisa profil ea hau ka tlhaiso-leseling e nepahetseng
gettingStarted.step2: Hokela liakhaonto tsa hau tsa mecha ea litaba ea sechaba
gettingStarted.step3: Theha Profaele ea Leano bakeng sa lets'oao la hau kapa letšolo
gettingStarted.step4: Hlahisa karolo ea hau ea pele ea litaba
gettingStarted.tip: Qala ka Profaele ea Leano ho netefatsa hore litaba tsohle tsa hau li boloka molumo le melaetsa e ts'oanang.

contentCreation.intro: Tlhahiso ea litaba e tsamaisoang ke AI ea Contentry e u thusa ho theha lingoliloeng tse khahlang ka metsotsoana.
contentCreation.feature1: Kenya sehlooho kapa potso e hlalosang seo o batlang ho se ngola ka sona
contentCreation.feature2: Khetha li-platform tseo u li batlang (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, jj.)
contentCreation.feature3: Khetha molumo oo u o ratang oa ho ngola
contentCreation.feature4: Ka boikhethelo hlahisa setšoantšo se tsamaeang le sona
contentCreation.schedulingDesc: Rera khalendara ea litaba tsa hau:
contentCreation.schedule1: Hlophisa kemiso ea tlhahiso ea litaba e pheta-phetoang
contentCreation.schedule2: Khetha matsatsi le linako tse itseng bakeng sa ho romella ka bohona
contentCreation.schedule3: Bulela ho romella ka bohona kapa tlhahlobo ea letsoho pele u phatlalatsa
contentCreation.tip: Sebelisa lebokose la ho hlahloba la 'Dikahare tsa Papatso' ha o theha dingolwa tsa papatso ho netefatsa hore tlhahlobo ya ho latela melao e nahana ka ditataiso tsa papatso.

analyzeContent.intro: Tšobotsi ea Analyse Content e hlahloba litaba tsa hau bakeng sa ho latela melao, kutloisiso ea setso le ho lumellana ha lebitso la k'hamphani.
analyzeContent.step1: Tsamaea ho ea ho Lekola Litaba > Hlahloba Litaba
analyzeContent.step2: Kenya litaba tsa hau sebakeng sa mongolo
analyzeContent.step3: Khetha Profaele ea Leano bakeng sa moelelo
analyzeContent.step4: Tobetsa Hlahlobisisa ho fumana maikutlo a qaqileng
analyzeContent.type1: Ho latela melao le litataiso tsa k'hamphani
analyzeContent.type2: Kutloisiso ea setso libakeng tse fapaneng
analyzeContent.type3: Ho tsitsa ha lentsoe le molumo oa lets'oao
analyzeContent.type4: Likotsi le likhothaletso tse ka bang teng
analyzeContent.tip: Kamehla sekaseka dikahare pele o di phatlalatsa dipolatefomong tsa kantle, haholoholo bakeng sa matsholo a shebaneng le dibaka tse ngata.

strategicProfiles.intro: Liprofaele tsa Maano li hlalosa moelelo, molumo le litataiso bakeng sa tlhahiso le tlhahlobo ea litaba.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Hlalosa bamameli ba reretsweng profil le sepheo sa eona
strategicProfiles.feature2: Beha lintlha tsa setso le tsa libaka
strategicProfiles.feature3: Kenya litokomane le litataiso tse amanang le boemo bo itseng
strategicProfiles.feature4: Lokisa molumo oa kamehla le likhetho tsa setaele
strategicProfiles.tip: Theha Liprofaele tse arohaneng tsa Maano bakeng sa matšolo a fapaneng, mabitso, kapa limmaraka tsa libaka.

socialAccounts.intro: Hokela liakhaonto tsa hau tsa mecha ea litaba ea sechaba ho phatlalatsa litaba ka kotloloho ho tsoa ho Contentry.
socialAccounts.platform1: LinkedIn - Maqephe a Motho ka Mong le a Khamphani
socialAccounts.warning: Boloka likhokahano tsa hau tsa ak'haonte ea sechaba li le nakong. Li-tokens tse feliloeng ke nako li ka thibela lingoliloeng tse reriloeng ho phatlalatsoa.

approvalProcess.intro: Haeba kgwebo ya hao e na le mesebetsi ya tumello e nolofaditsweng, dikahare di lokela ho hlahlojwa pele di phatlalatswa.
approvalProcess.step1: Theha kapa sekaseka dikahare tsa hao
approvalProcess.step2: Tobetsa 'Romella bakeng sa Tumello' ho romela ho mookameli oa hau
approvalProcess.step3: Latela boemo ba tumello moleng o emetseng tumello
approvalProcess.tip: Kenya dintlha ha o romela dikahare ho fa bahlahlobi moelelo mabapi le diqeto tsa hao tsa boqapi.

aboutGuide.title: Mabapi le Mekhoa e Metle ka ho Fetisisa
aboutGuide.description: Ithute hore na Contentry ke eng 'me u fumane mekhoa e metle ea ho ntlafatsa tlhahiso ea hau ea litaba, litheolelo tsa lihlahisoa, le liprofaele tsa batho ba susumetsang.

sections.influencerProfiles: Liprofaele tsa Batho ba Tšusumetsoang ke Tšusumetso

whatIsContentry.intro: Contentry ke sethala sa bohlale ba dikahare se tsamaiswang ke AI se reretsweng ho thusa baqapi ba dikahare, barekisi le dikgwebo ho theha, ho sekaseka le ho phatlalatsa dikahare tse dumellanang le melao ka tekanyo e kgolo. Ebang o motho ya susumetsang kapa o le karolo ya sehlopha se seholo sa papatso, Contentry e nolofatsa mosebetsi wa dikahare tsa hao.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Re lumela ho matlafatseng baqapi ka lisebelisoa tse bohlale tse netefatsang hore karolo e 'ngoe le e 'ngoe ea litaba e lumellana le lets'oao, e na le kutloelo-bohloko setsong, 'me e latela litataiso tsa sethala.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: Tlhahiso ea litaba e tsamaisoang ke AI e lumellanang le lentsoe la lets'oao la hau
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Tlhahlobo ea ho latela melao ea nako ea sebele bakeng sa litlhoko tsa taolo
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Tlhahlobo ea kutloisiso ea setso bakeng sa bamameli ba lefats'e ka bophara
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Mesebetsi ea tumello e hlophisitsoeng hantle bakeng sa lihlopha tsa likhoebo
whatIsContentry.tip: Contentry e kopanya matla a AI le tlhokomelo ea batho ho fana ka litaba tse lumellanang le bamameli ba hau ha ka nako e ts'oanang li ntse li latela melao.

keyFeatures.intro: Contentry e fana ka lisebelisoa tse felletseng tsa ho laola potoloho eohle ea bophelo ba hau ba litaba:
keyFeatures.aiContentTitle: Tlhahiso ea Litaba e Matlafatsoang ke AI
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Hlahisa dikahare tsa boleng bo hodimo tse etseditsweng letshwao la hao le bamameli ba hao:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Tlhahiso ea litaba tsa li-platform tse ngata (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Melumo ea mongolo e ka fetoloang (ea litsebi, e tloaelehileng, e susumetsang)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: Tlhahiso ea litšoantšo tsa AI e tla tsamaea le lingoliloeng tsa hau
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Netefatsa hore litaba tsa hau li fihlela litlhoko tsohle pele u li phatlalatsa:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Tlhahlobo ea ho latela melao ka boiketsetso khahlanong le melaoana ea k'hamphani
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Ho fumana lintlha tsa kutloisiso ea setso bakeng sa bamameli ba machabeng
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Tlhahlobo ea kotsi ka likhothaletso tse ka sebelisoang
keyFeatures.tip: Sebelisa Liprofaele tsa Maano ho netefatsa hore lentsoe la k'hamphani lea tsitsisa ho pholletsa le litaba tsohle tse hlahisitsoeng.

bestPractices.intro: Ho latela mekhoa ena e metle ho tla u thusa ho fumana molemo o moholo ho Contentry le ho theha dikahare tse sebetsang hantle:
bestPractices.workflowTitle: Theha Mokgwa wa Mosebetsi wa Dikahare
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Mokhoa o tsitsitseng oa mosebetsi o netefatsa boleng le katleho:
bestPractices.workflow1: Qala ka ho theha Profaele ea hau ea Leano ka litataiso tsa lets'oao
bestPractices.workflow2: Hlahisa dikahare ka ho nahana ka sethala le bamameli ba itseng
bestPractices.workflow3: Kamehla sekaseka dikahare pele o di phatlalatsa dipolatefomong tsa kantle
bestPractices.workflow4: Sebelisa likarolo tsa kemiso ho boloka mokhoa o tsitsitseng oa ho beha poso
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Ho ba le lebitso le tsitsitseng ho haha ts'epo le kananelo:
bestPractices.consistency1: Kenya tataiso ea setaele sa lets'oao la hau ho Setsi sa Tsebo
bestPractices.consistency2: Sebelisa Profaele e tšoanang ea Leano bakeng sa matšolo a amanang
bestPractices.consistency3: Hlahloba dikahare tse hlahisitsweng ke AI ho netefatsa hore di tsamaisana le lentswe la hao
bestPractices.warning: Kamehla hlahloba dikahare tse hlahisitsweng ke AI pele o di phatlalatsa. Le hoja AI ya rona e le matla, tlhokomelo ya batho e netefatsa diphetho tse ntle ka ho fetisisa.

optimizeContent.intro: Ho theha dikahare tse ntle ke qalo feela. Mona ke mokhoa oa ho ntlafatsa bakeng sa ho kenella ho hoholo:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Sethala se seng le se seng se na le litlhoko tse ikhethang le litebello tsa bamameli:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Tsepamisa maikutlo ho temohisiso ea litsebi, sebelisa mantsoe a bohlokoa a indasteri, mokhoa o amohelehang o nkang nako e telele
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Melaetsa e khutšoanyane, sebelisa li-hashtag ka bohlale, sebelisana le lihlooho tse tummeng
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook: Dikahare tse bonahalang di sebetsa hantle, di kgothaletsa ho kenya letsoho ha setjhaba
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: Litšoantšo tsa boleng bo holimo lia hlokahala, sebelisa li-hashtag tse loketseng, Lipale bakeng sa ho kopanela
optimizeContent.engagement1: Romela molaetsa ka linako tse loketseng bamameli ba hau
optimizeContent.engagement2: Sebelisa memo e qobellang ea ho nka khato litaba tsa hau
optimizeContent.engagement3: Arabela maikutlo 'me u ikopanye le sechaba sa heno
optimizeContent.engagement4: Latela tlhahlobo ho utloisisa hore na ke dikahare dife tse sebetsang hantle ka ho fetisisa
optimizeContent.tip: Sebelisa tšobotsi ea kemiso ea Contentry ho romella ka linako tse ntle ntle le boiteko ba letsoho.

brandDeals.intro: Likamano tsa khoebo tsa mabitso e ka ba mohloli o moholo oa chelete. Mokhoa oa ho ntlafatsa mokhoa oa hau ke ona:
brandDeals.prep1: Boloka pokello ea litaba ea profeshenale le e tsitsitseng
brandDeals.prep2: Latela le ho bonts'a litekanyo tsa hau tsa boitlamo
brandDeals.prep3: Haha sesebelisoa sa mecha ea litaba ka palo ea batho ba hau le phihlello ea hau
brandDeals.prep4: Sebelisa Contentry ho hlahisa mehlala ea mehopolo ea dikahare tse nang le lebitso le ikhethang
brandDeals.pitchingDesc: Etsa hore lipolelo tsa hau li hlahelle:
brandDeals.pitch1: Lumellanya polelo ea hau le boleng ba lets'oao le bamameli ba reriloeng
brandDeals.pitch2: Fana ka mehopolo e itseng ea litaba ho fapana le litlhahiso tse akaretsang
brandDeals.pitch3: Kenya tlhahlobo ea ho latela melao ho bontša hore litaba tsa hau li latela litataiso
brandDeals.tip: Sebelisa tlhahlobo ea ho latela melao ea Contentry ha u theha litaba tse tšehelitsoeng ho netefatsa hore litlhoko tsa FTC le tsa ho senola sethala lia fihlelleha.

influencerProfiles.intro: Profaele ea hau ea Leano ke motheo oa leano la hau la litaba. Mokhoa oa ho e ntlafatsa ke ona:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Profaele e hlophisitsweng hantle e netefatsa dikahare tse tsitsitseng, tse ho brand:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Hlalosa sebaka sa hau sa marang-rang le bamameli ba hau ka ho hlaka
influencerProfiles.setup2: Beha molumo le setaele seo u se ratang sa ho ngola
influencerProfiles.setup3: Kenya mehopolo ea setso le ea libaka bakeng sa bamameli ba hau
influencerProfiles.setup4: Kenya litokomane tsa litšupiso tse hlalosang lentsoe la lets'oao la hau
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Ntlafatsa boemo ba hau khafetsa bakeng sa liphetho tse betere:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Hlahloba dikahare tse hlahisitsweng mme o fetole di-setting tsa profil ha ho hlokahala
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Theha liprofaele tse ngata bakeng sa matšolo kapa bamameli ba fapaneng
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Boloka Setsi sa hau sa Tsebo se ntse se le teng ka litataiso tsa morao-rao tsa lets'oao
influencerProfiles.tip: Hlahloba Profaele ea hau ea Leano kotara ho netefatsa hore e bonahatsa lets'oao la hau le ntseng le fetoha le bamameli.

workflowsGuide.title: Tataiso ea Mosebetsi le ea ho Fumana Lintlha
workflowsGuide.description: Ithute kamoo sistimi ea ho fumana lintlha e sebetsang kateng 'me u utloisise mohato o mong le o mong oa mosebetsi ho tloha tlhahlobong ea litaba ho ea ho tumello.
workflowsGuide.feature1: Ho Hlalositsoe Sistimi ea ho Fumana Lintlha
workflowsGuide.feature2: Hlahloba Tsamaiso ea Mosebetsi ea Litaba

scoring.intro: Sistimi ea ho fumana lintlha ho Contentry e fana ka lintlha tse hlakileng, tse thehiloeng kotlong ho u thusa ho utloisisa hore na litaba tsa hau li sebetsa joang. Lintlha tsohle li qala ho 100 'me lintlha lia tlosoa bakeng sa litlolo tse itseng kapa mathata a fumanoeng.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Sephetho ka kakaretso ke motsoako o leka-lekaneng oa lintlha tsohle tsa tlhahlobo, ho tloha ho 0 ho isa ho 100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: E ntle haholo - E loketse ho phatlalatsoa, dikahare di ntlafaditswe haholo
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: E ntle - Lintlafatso tse nyane li khothaletsoa pele ho phatlalatsoa
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Ho Hlokahala Tlhokomelo - Tlhahlobo le litokiso lia hlokahala
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: E tšoailoe - Mathata a bohlokoa, u se ke ua a phatlalatsa ho fihlela a rarollotsoe
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Sephetho ka kakaretso se sebelisa boima bo feto-fetohang ho latela boemo ba kotsi:
scoring.overallCalc1: Maemo a Tloaelehileng: (Ho Latela Melao × 40%) + (Setso × 30%) + (Ho Nepahala × 30%)
scoring.overallCalc2: Kotsi e Phahameng (Ho latela Melao ≤60): (Ho latela Melao × 50%) + (Setso × 30%) + (Ho nepahala × 20%)
scoring.overallCalc3: Kotsi ea Botumo (Setso ≤50): (Ho latela melao × 40%) + (Setso × 40%) + (Ho nepahala × 20%)
scoring.overallCalc4: Kotsi e Bohlokoa (Ho latela Melao ≤40): Kakaretso ea lintlha e koetsoe ka thata ho fihlela ho 40 max
scoring.componentsDesc: Sephetho sa hau ka kakaretso se baloa ho tsoa likarolong tse tharo tsa bohlokoa ho sebelisoa sistimi e thehiloeng kotlong:
scoring.component1: Sephetho sa ho Latela Melao: Ho qala ho 100, ho ntšoa lintlha ka tlōlo ea molao e fumanoeng
scoring.component2: Sephetho sa ho Amohela Setso: Karolelano ea litekanyo tse 6 tsa setso tsa Hofstede
scoring.component3: Sephetho sa Nepahalo: E qala ho 100, e tlosa lintlha ka ho se nepahale kapa bothata bo fumanoeng
scoring.complianceDetailTitle: Sephetho sa ho Latela Melao (Ho Thehiloe Kotlong)
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Poso e 'ngoe le e 'ngoe e qala ka Sephetho sa ho Latela Melao sa 100. Lintlha lia tlosoa bakeng sa tlōlo e 'ngoe le e 'ngoe ea molao:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Tlolo ea Molao e Bohlokoa (-60 pts): Tlolo ea NDA, ho senoloa ha tlhahisoleseling ea lekunutu → Kotsi ea ho felisoa hang-hang
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Tlōlo e Matla (-40 lintlha): Tlhekefetso, khethollo, puo ea lehloeo → Kotsi ea liketso tsa molao
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Tlōlo e Phahameng ea Molao (-25 pts): Ho sieo ha phatlalatso ea papatso, tlōlo ea molao → Kotsi ea likotlo/ho emisoa
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Tlolo e itekanetseng (-10 pts): Molumo o sa lokelang, ho kheloha hanyane ha tataiso → Koetliso/temoso
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Mohlala: #ad e sieo (-25) + Bothata ba molumo (-10) = Lintlha tsa ho qetela tsa 65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Tlhōrō ea litlolo tse ngata - kotlo ka 'ngoe e sebelisoa ka kakaretso
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Litlolo tse hlahlobiloeng: Tlhahisoleseding ea lekunutu, Tlhekefetso, tlōlo ea NDA, Ho sieo ha phatlalatso, tlōlo ea leano, Molumo o sa lokelang
scoring.culturalDetailTitle: Lintlha tsa Setso (Litekanyo tse 6 tsa Hofstede)
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Palo ea setso ke karolelano ea litekanyo tse tšeletseng tsa semmuso tsa setso sa Hofstede (0-100 ka 'ngoe):
scoring.culturalDim1: Sebaka sa Matla: Semmuso, tlhompho bakeng sa bolaoli khahlanong le tekano, molumo o sa reroang
scoring.culturalDim2: Boiketlo khahlanong le Bokopano: Ho tsepamisa maikutlo sechabeng sa ''Na/' khahlanong le ho tsepamisa maikutlo sechabeng sa 'Rona/Rōna'
scoring.culturalDim3: Bonna khahlanong le Bosadi: Puo ea tlholisano/e tiileng khahlanong le ea tšebelisano-'moho/e lumellanang
scoring.culturalDim4: Ho Qoba ho se Tiisehe: Melao, polokeho, khatiso ea ho hlaka khahlanong le ho buleha ho se hlaka
scoring.culturalDim5: Boikutlo ba Nako e Telele: Tsepamiso ea meputso ea nakong e tlang khahlanong le melemo ea nako e khuts'oane
scoring.culturalDim6: Ho ikhotsofatsa khahlanong le ho ithiba: Puo e nang le tšepo/monate khahlanong le puo e sa laoleheng/e laoloang
scoring.culturalCalc: Sephetho sa Setso = (Kakaretso ea lintlha tsa tekanyo e 6) ÷ 6
scoring.culturalRisk: Ha Sephetho sa Setso se theohela ka tlase ho 50, ho sebediswa boima ba 'Botumo ba Kotsi' ho sireletsa letshwao la hao ho bashebelli ba lefatshe lohle.
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Poso e 'ngoe le e 'ngoe e qala ka Accuracy Score ea 100. Lintlha lia tlosoa bakeng sa mathata a fumanoeng:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Ho se Nepahale ho Hoholo/Tlhahisoleseling e Fosahetseng (-40 pts): Lipolelo tsa bohata, lintlha tse iqapetsoeng
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Mohloli o sa Tšepahaleng (-20 pts): Litlaleho tse tsoang mehloling e sa tšepahaleng
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Tseko e sa Nepahaleng (-10 pts): Lipolelo tse ke keng tsa hlahlojoa hore na linnete ke life
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Mohlala: Polelo ea bohata (-40) + Mohloli o sa netefatsoang (-20) = Lintlha tsa ho qetela tsa 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Mekhahlelo e mengata ea litaba - kotlo ka 'ngoe e sebelisoa ka kakaretso
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Dikahare di tshwailwe ka boiketsetso ho latela diphetho tsa tlhahlobo:
scoring.flag1: Khaso e Ntle (e Tala): Lintlha tse kaholimo ho 80 - li se li loketse ho phatlalatsoa
scoring.flag2: E Hloka Tlhokomelo (E mosehla): Lintlha tse 60-79 - ho khothaletsoa lintlafatso tse nyane
scoring.flag3: E tšoaelitsoe bakeng sa Tlhahlobo (Orange): Lintlha tse 40-59 - tlhahlobo ea hlokahala pele ho phatlalatsoa
scoring.flag4: Mathata a Bohlokoa (Bofubelu): Lintlha tse ka tlase ho 40 - u se ke ua phatlalatsa ho fihlela li rarollotsoe
scoring.disclosureDesc: Bakeng sa dikahare tsa papatso, sistimi e boetse e hlahloba:
scoring.disclosure1: Ke Papatso: E lemoha hore na litaba ke tsa papatso kapa li tšehelitsoe
scoring.disclosure2: E na le Tsebiso: Litlhahlobo bakeng sa #papatso e nepahetseng, #tšehelitsoeng, kapa phatlalatso ea tšebelisano-'moho
scoring.disclosure3: Ho Latela Melao ea Libaka: Ho netefatsa litlhoko tsa ho senola tsa FTC (US), EU, le Norway
scoring.disclosure4: Ho sieo ha phatlalatso ho baka Tlolo e Phahameng (lintlha tse -25) ho Lintlha tsa ho Latela Melao
scoring.tip: Liphetho li baloa bocha nako le nako ha litaba li hlahlojoa. Sebelisa tšobotsi ea ho Ngola Bocha ho ntlafatsa ka bohona litaba tse nang le lintlha tse tlase ha u ntse u boloka molaetsa oa hau.

analyze.intro: Mokhoa oa ho sekaseka Dikahare o u thusa ho lekola dikahare tse teng bakeng sa ho latela melao, kutloelo-bohloko ea setso le boleng pele o li phatlalatsa.
analyze.stepsDesc: Latela mehato ena ho sekaseka dikahare tsa hao:
analyze.step1: Tsamaea ho ea ho Bohlale ba Litaba > Sekaseka Litaba
analyze.step2: Beha kapa thaepa dikahare tsa hao sebakeng sa mongolo
analyze.step3: Khetha Profaele ea Leano ho sebelisa litataiso tsa lets'oao la hau
analyze.step4: Ka boikhethelo, hlahloba 'Hlahisa setšoantšo se tsamaeang le sona' haeba u batla hore AI e thehe pono
analyze.step5: Tobetsa 'Hlahloba' ho tsamaisa tlhahlobo e felletseng
analyze.type1: Tlhahlobo ea ho Latela Melao: E netefatsa litaba khahlanong le maano le melawana ea sethala (FTC, GDPR)
analyze.type2: Ho Senola Setso: Ho hlahloba dikahare tse ka bang kotsi kapa tse sa ameheng setsong
analyze.type3: Netefatso ea Nepahalo: E hlahloba liqoso le lintlha bakeng sa ho nepahala
analyze.type4: Ho Lokisa Letšoao: Ho bapisa litaba le litataiso tsa Profaele ea hau ea Leano
analyze.tip: Sebelisa konopo ea 'Ngola Bocha' ho ntlafatsa ka bohona litaba tse nang le lintlha tse ka tlase ho 70. AI e tla rarolla mathata a tšoailoeng ha e ntse e boloka molaetsa oa hau.

generate.intro: Mokgwa wa tshebetso wa ho Hlahisa Dikahare o sebedisa AI ho theha dikahare tse ntjha ho latela sehlooho sa hao, ditlhoko tsa sethala, le ditataiso tsa letshwao.
generate.step1: Tsamaea ho ea ho Bohlale ba Litaba > tab ea Tlhahiso ea Litaba
generate.step2: Kenya sehlooho sa hau kapa u hlalose seo u batlang ho se theha
generate.step3: Khetha sethala(li) seo u se batlang le molumo oa ho ngola
generate.step4: Khetha Profaele ea Leano bakeng sa botsitso ba lets'oao
generate.step5: Tobetsa 'Hlahisa' ho theha dikahare tse tsamaiswang ke AI
generate.optionsDesc: Iketsetse dikahare tsa hao tse hlahisitsweng ka dikgetho tsena:
generate.option1: Khetho ea Sethala: Khetha sethala se le seng kapa tse ngata (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
generate.option2: Molumo oa ho Ngola: Khetha ho tsoa ho ea Setsebi, ea Mokhoa o sa Tloaelehang, ea Khothatsang, kapa ea Tsebisang
generate.option3: Bolelele ba Dikahare: Fetola bolelele ba sepheo bakeng sa dikahare tsa hao
generate.option4: Ho Hlahisa Litšoantšo: Bulela ho theha setšoantšo se tsamaeang le sona se hlahisitsoeng ke AI
generate.tip: Dikahare tse hlahisitsweng di sekasekwa ka boiketsetso ka mora ho qaptjoa. Hlahloba dintlha mme o sebedise dikonopo tsa maikutlo ho ntjhafatsa ha ho hlokahala.

schedulePrompt.intro: Kemiso ea Kemiso e u lumella ho theha tlhahiso ea litaba e iketsahallang e sebetsang ka linako tse boletsoeng, e boloka khalendara ea litaba tsa hau e tletse ntle le ho kenella ka letsoho.
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Etsa litlhahiso tse hlahisang litaba ka boiketsetso:
schedulePrompt.step1: Theha tlhahiso ea hau ea tlhahiso ea litaba ka sehlooho le likhetho
schedulePrompt.step2: Beha makhetlo a kemiso (letsatsi le letsatsi, beke le beke, kapa matsatsi a itseng)
schedulePrompt.step3: Khetha nako eo dikahare di lokelang ho hlahiswa ka yona
schedulePrompt.step4: Nolofatsa 'Hlahloba ka bohona' ho tsamaisa tlhahlobo ea litaba tse hlahisitsoeng ka bohona
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Boloka poso e tsitsitseng ntle le mosebetsi oa letsatsi le letsatsi oa matsoho
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Hlahisa dikahare nakong ya dihora tse ntle ka ho fetisisa tsa boqapi
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Haha mesaletsa ea litaba bakeng sa tlhahlobo le tumello
schedulePrompt.tip: Litlhahiso tse reriloeng li hlahisa litaba ho meralo ea hau. Hlahloba le ho li amohela pele u li phatlalatsa ho netefatsa boleng.

schedulePost.intro: Kemiso ea Poso e u lumella ho beha litaba tse amohetsoeng moleng bakeng sa phatlalatso e iketsahallang ka linako tse ntle ho pholletsa le li-platform tsa hau tsa mecha ea litaba ea sechaba tse hokahaneng.
schedulePost.step1: Ho tsoa ponong efe kapa efe ea litaba, tobetsa 'Kemiso' ho e-na le 'Phatlalatsa Hona Joale'
schedulePost.step2: Khetha letsatsi le nako eo u e rerileng bakeng sa ho phatlalatsa
schedulePost.step3: Khetha hore na ke li-platform life tsa sechaba tse hokahaneng tseo u ka phatlalatsang ho tsona
schedulePost.step4: Netefatsa 'me u kenye lethathamong la hau le reriloeng
schedulePost.optionsDesc: Lokisa liposo tsa hau tse reriloeng:
schedulePost.option1: Nako e Ikhethang: Khetha letsatsi le nako e nepahetseng bakeng sa phatlalatso
schedulePost.option2: Nako e Molemohali: E re AI e fane ka maikutlo a linako tse ntle tsa ho romella ho latela lintlha tsa boitlamo
schedulePost.option3: Li-platform tse ngata: Rera litaba tse tšoanang li-platform tse ngata ka nako e le 'ngoe
schedulePost.warning: Liposo tse reriloeng li hloka bonyane ak'haonte e le 'ngoe e hokahaneng ea mecha ea litaba ea sechaba. Hokela liakhaonto ho Litlhophiso > Liprofaele tsa Sechaba.

approval.intro: Mokgwa wa ho Amohela o netefatsa boleng ba dikahare ka ho hloka hore mookamedi a hlahlobe pele ho phatlalatsoa. Sena se bohlokwa haholo bakeng sa dihlopha tsa dikgwebo le diindasteri tse laolwang.
approval.processDesc: Kamoo dikahare di tsamayang kateng mosebetsing wa tumello:
approval.step1: Moqapi o romela dikahare ka ho tobetsa 'Romela bakeng sa Tumello'
approval.step2: Dikahare di hlaha ho Letoto la Kamohelo la molaodi
approval.step3: Motsamaisi o hlahloba dikahare, dintlha le diphetho tsa tlhahlobo
approval.step4: Motsamaisi o amohela, o kopa diphetoho, kapa o hana dikahare
approval.status1: Moralo: Dikahare di ntse di sebetswa, ha di so romelwe
approval.status2: E Emetse Kamohelo: E rometsoe mme e emetse tlhahlobo ea mookameli
approval.status3: E Amohetsoe: E loketse ho phatlalatsoa kapa ho kemisoa
approval.status4: Tlhahlobo ea Litlhoko: Motsamaisi o kopile liphetoho - hlahloba maikutlo 'me u romelle hape
approval.tip: Kenya dintlha ha o romela dikahare ho fa bahlahlobi moelelo mabapi le diqeto tsa hao tsa boqapi. Sena se potlakisa tshebetso ya tumello.

confirmDelete.userMessage: Na u na le bonnete ba hore u batla ho hlakola mosebelisi enoa? Ketso ena e ke ke ea fetoloa.
confirmDelete.bulkMessage: Na o na le bonnete ba hore o batla ho hlakola basebedisi ba {{count}}? Ketso ena e ke ke ya etsollwa.

confirmCancelSubscription.message: Na o na le bonnete ba hore o batla ho hlakola peeletso ea mosebelisi enoa? Ba tla lahleheloa ke phihlello ea likarolo tsa premium.

security.title: Litlhophiso tsa Tšireletso
security.description: Laola tshireletso ea ak'haonte ea hau

twoFactorAuth.title: Netefatso ea Lintlha tse peli

gdpr.weValuePrivacy: Re Nka Lekunutu la Hao e le la Bohlokoa
gdpr.cookieDescription: Re sebelisa di-cookie ho ntlafatsa boiphihlelo ba hau ba ho bala, ho sebeletsa litaba tse ikhethileng, le ho sekaseka sephethephethe sa rona. Ka ho tobetsa "Amohela Tsohle", u lumela hore re sebelise di-cookie. U ka iketsetsa likhetho tsa hau kapa ua hana di-cookie tse seng tsa bohlokoa.
gdpr.readPrivacyPolicy: Bala Leano la rona la Lekunutu
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: E hlokahala bakeng sa netefatso, tshireletso, le ts'ebetso ea mantlha. E ke ke ea tima.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Re thuse ho utloisisa hore na baeti ba sebelisana joang le sethala sa rona ho ntlafatsa lits'ebeletso tsa rona.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: E sebelisoa ho fana ka lipapatso tse ikhethileng le ho lekanya katleho ea letšolo.
